name: Rocket Raccoon

abilities.name: Custom Blaster
abilities.details: Fires his heavily modified energy rifle.

abilities.name: Grav Grenade
abilities.details: Throws a device that activates after a short delay, pulling nearby enemies towards its center.

abilities.name: Jetpack Boost
abilities.details: Uses his jetpack for brief flight or directional boosts. Consumes fuel.

abilities.name: Deploy Turret?
abilities.details: Deploys a small automated turret that fires at nearby enemies. (Existence/details need confirmation for Rivals).

ultimate.name: Hadron Enforcer
ultimate.range: Long Range Projectile / Small AoE on impact
ultimate.effect: Fires an extremely powerful explosive projectile from an oversized weapon.
ultimate.details: Brings out the big guns for massive burst damage.

passives.name: Tinkerer
passives.details: Faster interaction speed with objectives or deployables?

teamups.effect: Can ride on Groot's shoulder. Grav Grenade cooldown reduced when near Star-Lord.

lore: Subject 89P13, a genetically and cybernetically enhanced raccoon from Halfworld. Rocket is a master tactician, engineer, and marksman, often serving with the Guardians of the Galaxy alongside his best friend Groot.
